document.full_text: the tiny pacific island nation of nauru has established diplomatic relations with south ossetia, becoming the fourth country to regard the separatist enclave as a sovereign country, rather than part of georgia.
document.title: europe: a diplomatic advance for south ossetia
lines_and_colors: the tiny pacific island nation of nauru has established diplomatic relations with south ossetia, becoming the fourth country to regard the separatist enclave as a sovereign country, rather than part of georgia.
